items.sentence: Tom won\'t be going back to Boston after this, will he?
If you could lend me some money, I\'d be very grateful.
When did you find out that Tom didn\'t want to do that?
You\'ve gotten used to having Tom around, haven\'t you?
Tom knew better than to tell that kind of joke to Mary.
I can\'t help thinking that Tom should be here with us.
I don\'t think any of us are happy about what happened.
I\'m the one who told Tom about what you did yesterday.
I\'ve been debating whether I should mention it or not.
Tom wants to grow a beard, but his wife won\'t let him.
